3: Ha... Ha...
There are too many... enemies...
They keep coming out... It seems they won't stop at all...
We can't go on like this.
Continue.
Wait, Lucia, you're injured!
Your vital fluid is leaking. Are you okay?
The Inver-Device is still intact, I can continue to fight.
I now see why they say you have a high affinity for combat. You practically throw your life out there.
I don't understand.
'Life' isn't an apt description for us Constructs.
Even if the frame is damaged, after repairs and maintenance, we can continue on after a reboot.
Ye... yeah, I mean, just reboot...
It's always been this way. But even so... is it really enough to make you put your life on the line...
(Slither, slither...)
Kamui... Ka... mui...
Koya?!
Kamui, we're desperate... for help... need... support...
Give me your coordinate! I'll be right there!
Wait for me!
Hang on... everyone...
